dialog-trekkie-start1.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
Me want to wish you a happy birthday,
%PLAYER%.

dialog-trekkie-start1.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Aww, gee, thanks, Farmer
%Trekkie%!

dialog-trekkie-start2.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
Me sorry, %PLAYER%...
but the internet still no working.

dialog-trekkie-start2.name: %PLAYER%
messages: It's the Ether Nettles, again?

dialog-trekkie-start3.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
It always the Ether Nettles. Modem need
Ether Nettles. Ever since the big bad
hack, the Ether Nettles line up wrong.

dialog-trekkie-start3.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
You can't move the flowers? Put them in
the right order?

dialog-trekkie-start4.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
Can't just dig up Ether Nettles. Wired
in super, super well.

Once in a while, me move one, take all
day, but it no work.

dialog-trekkie-start4.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Well, maybe I can help. What order are
they supposed to be in?

dialog-trekkie-start4.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
Ether Nettle spec on internet.
But no Ether Nettle, no internet, me no
can check!
Me remember orange stripey is first.

But trial and error take so long, me want
to give up.

dialog-trekkie-start4.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Well, lemme have a go. I can change their
colors instantly.
Probably.

dialog-trekkie-start4.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
%PLAYER% has new magic zeroed ring.
Maybe %PLAYER% can do it!

dialog-trekkie-end.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
%PLAYER% did it!
Made Ether Nettle talk to outside world
again!

Me can go on the internet! Can use so many
free AOL hours!
Me has so, so many AOL CDs! Me excited!

dialog-trekkie-end.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Sounds great, %Trekkie%.

dialog-trekkie-start-s.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
Me can't remember Ether Nettle color
order. Me need internet to check!

But me do remember orange stripey is
first!

dialog-trekkie-oh.name: %Trekkie%
messages: Oh!

dialog-trekkie-end-s.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
So, %Trekkie%....
What's the internet for, anyway?

dialog-trekkie-end-s.name: %Trekkie%
messages:
Oh, me know what the internet is for. The
internet is for....

dialog-trekkie-end-s.name: %Trekkie%
messages: How old is %PLAYER%, again?

dialog-solve-ethernet-puzzle.name: %Debug Man%
messages: Ether Nettle restored.
